CustomField.description: Created as part of Rebate- GTMS-27049
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Finance_Partner__c, ""),ISBLANK(Finance_Partner_Account__c)), Competitor_Buyout_Amount__c,0) + IF(Future_Free_Months_Amount__c > 0, Future_Free_Months_Amount__c,0) + IF(OTD_Amt__c > 0, OTD_Amt__c,0)
CustomField.label: Non Recurring Discounts
